course_details: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using the Python programming language.
MySQL is the de-facto standard database system for web sites with HUGE volumes of both data and end-users (like Facebook, Twitter, and Wikipedia).
It is a very popular language, despite being old. The main reason for its popularity is because it is a fundamental language in the field of computer science.
Algorithms is a foundational course in computer science and mathematics that typically covers Algorithm Basics, Algorithm Analysis, Data Structures.
This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the C++ programming language with a focus on its applications in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).
This course covers a wide range of topics including software requirements analysis, design patterns, coding best practices, software testing, and project management.
Enhance your problem-solving skills and tackle complex challenges with confidence. This course covers various problem-solving techniques.
